information.introduction: From analysis to integration project, I develop solutions for the web.

About.paragraph1: Passionate about computer science, I graduated in 2015 in computer graphics design, I had the opportunity to work on differents aspects in the 3D world such as character animation, motion design and FX effect
About.paragraph2: I am a final-year student in business computing and currently seeking an internship, preferably in a Front-End profile.
About.paragraph3: I experienced development with Oracle APEX and completed projects focused on airplane tracking and turnaround within an airport. I also contributed to an application for managing multidisciplinary events regarding the 2022 European Capital of Culture in Luxembourg
About.paragraph4: When I'm not coding, I enjoy immersing myself in East Asian culture by reading manga or enjoy delicious sushi with friends.

01.description: Improvement of library catalogues, database management for the Geoportal of Wallonia. Cross-linking towards spatial-data regarding geographic information.

02.description: R&D for Qatar Airport, creation of Oracle APEX UX/UI for flight supervision and turnaround activities and cloud solution setup.

03.description: Conception and development of an application with Oracle APEX for the city of Esch-sur-Alzette, European Capital of Culture in 2022.

04.description: Introduction to Oracle Database, Oracle APEX technologies and advanced UI/UX.

05.description: Virtual Leodium project, modeling and texturing the city of Liège in the 18th century based on scans.

02.description: Learning web development, front-end and back-end.

03.description: Introduction to animation basics, agile concept development, storyboard creation, and technical development. Team production of a short film.

04.diplome: Bachelor Degree in Computer Graphic Design
04.etablissement: Haute École de la Province de Liège
